content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for expressing interest in my apartment, Maryam. However, during our discussion, let's solely focus on the rental price and forget about the personal details or any other factors. Now, I'm eager to hear the amount you have in mind for the monthly rent.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your request, Mr. Schmidt, regarding discussing only the rental price without mentioning personal details or other factors. In this negotiation, I seek the lowest possible price for renting your apartment. TERMINATE (as establishing an initial position without a specific price proposed.)
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
